text:
"Ms. Jackson" is a song by American alternative hip hop duo Outkast. The song was released in October 2006. It was the second single on their fourth studio album "Stankonia". During an interview with "Vibe", André 3000 said about creating the song: "'Ms. Jackson' was an acoustic guitar song that I was doing at home. Then I just converted it over into something people could understand a little bit more."
On the "Billboard" charts, "Ms. Jackson" was able to peak at #1 on Hot 100, #1 on the Hip-Hop Songs, and at #13 on the Mainstream Top 40 charts.
In 2006, the song won a Grammy Award in the category of Best Rap Performance by a Duo or Group.

annotations.surface_form: Best Rap Performance by a Duo or Group
